quest.name: Not Who They Seem
journal: As Tonaxia tells it, the touched sylphs have mastered an incantation that allows them to conceal their identity, and have been putting it to liberal use to conduct surprise attacks on the sylphs of Little Solace. Employ the truesight scalebombs that she has furnished you with to put an end to their malicious ruse.
The shifty sylpheeds are no more. Inform Tonaxia that the deed is done.

Pleased that the malicious masquerade has come to an end, Tonaxia thanks you for your efforts. Fearing that it is only a matter of time before the touched sylphs devise a new ruse, she begs you not to venture far from Little Solace.
objectives: Throw truesight scalebombs at the suspicious objects and defeat sylpheed chuckles.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Friendly one! Wait...is friendly one really friendly one? This one cannot trust any one anymore!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Why? Because touched ones have learned sneaky skin-changing spell! Sneaky ones change skin, then jump out and hurt these ones! This one is afraid to leave Little Solace.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: ...Friendly one does not hurt this one. Good, this one can trust friendly one, give friendly one see-boom.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: See-boom will let friendly one see through changed skin, see sneaky ones' sneaky selves.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Friendly one will search for sneaky ones, yes? Bring an end to sneaky ones' sneaking?

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Friendly one will use see-boom to bring an end to sneaky ones' sneaking, yes?

dialogue.name: OLDMAN
dialogue.text: Ah, so this is Larkscall, primeval home of the august sylphs! This one...er, this old man has never seen such beauty!

dialogue.name: OLDWOMAN
dialogue.text: Greetings, walking─ah, adventurer. Would you be so kind as to show this old lady to Little Solace?

dialogue.name: SUIMMER
dialogue.text: Ah, nothing like a wade in a forest stream. The crisp, cool waters send a most pleasant shiver up my wings─er, spine?

dialogue.name: RUGAO
dialogue.text: Many weapons for sale have I. Stabby ones, slicy ones, pokey ones, prickly ones...

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMY
dialogue.text: But this one's disguise was perfect!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMY
dialogue.text: Walking one is no fun! Die, boring one!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMY
dialogue.text: Walking one should mind one's own business!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you, friendly one! Maybe that will teach sneaky ones that these ones are not so easily fooled.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This one has no doubt that touched ones are planning more sneakiness. Pray do not leave these ones yet, friendly one.
